item.title: 矿业公司淡水河谷将在 Alianca Energia 合资公司交易中获得 10 亿美元收益
item.description: 巴西矿业公司淡水河谷周一表示，同意通过其巴西可再生能源业务 Alianca Energia 与美国投资公司 Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP) 组建合资企业。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale said on Monday it agreed to form a joint venture with U.S.-based investment firm Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP) through its Brazilian renewable energy business Alianca Energia.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 2 月份零售额微增 0.2
item.description: 澳大利亚 2 月份的零售额连续第二个月小幅增长，原因是期待已久的降息与通胀放缓相结合，提振了消费者情绪和消费能力。【原文：Australian retail sales rose modestly for a second straight month in February as a long-awaited cut in interest rates combined with slower inflation to boost consumer sentiment and spending power.】

item.title: 日本制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，日本工厂活动降幅回升
item.description: 周二的一项私营部门调查显示，由于需求减弱和美国贸易战升级给制造业前景蒙上阴影，日本 3 月份的工厂活动加速下滑。【原文：Japan's factory activity declines accelerated in March as demand weakened and the escalating U.S. trade war clouded the manufacturing outlook, a private-sector survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 挪威主权财富基金将投票反对力拓双重上市审查决议
item.description: 挪威主权财富基金网站显示，挪威银行投资管理公司（Norges Bank Investment Management）将投票反对矿业巨头力拓（Rio Tinto）审查其在伦敦和悉尼两地上市的决议。【原文：Norges Bank Investment Management will vote against a resolution for mining major Rio Tinto to review its two listings in London and Sydney, the website for Norway's sovereign wealth fund showed.】

item.title: 特朗普关税不确定性挥之不去，日本商业情绪恶化
item.description: 日本央行周二的一项调查显示，在截至 3 月份的三个月里，日本大型制造商的商业景气恶化，这表明不断升级的贸易紧张局势已经对依赖出口的日本经济造成了影响。【原文：Business sentiment among big Japanese manufacturers worsened in the three months to March, a central bank survey showed on Tuesday, a sign escalating trade tensions were already taking a toll on the export-reliant economy.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回 J&J 100 亿美元婴儿爽身粉和解协议
item.description: 周一，一名美国破产法官驳回了强生公司提出的 100 亿美元终止指控其婴儿爽身粉和其他滑石粉产品导致卵巢癌的诉讼的建议，这是该公司的破产策略第三次在法庭上失败。【原文：A U.S. bankruptcy judge on Monday rejected Johnson & Johnson's $10 billion proposal to end lawsuits alleging that its baby powder and other talc products cause ovarian cancer, marking the third time the company's bankruptcy strategy has failed in court.】

item.title: 法国 3 月汽车注册量下降 14.54%，特斯拉销量下降 36.83
item.description: 法国汽车机构PFA周二公布的数据显示，3月份法国新车注册量为153,842辆，同比下降14.54%。【原文：New car registrations in France fell 14.54% in March from a year earlier to 153,842 vehicles, data from French car body PFA showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回 J&J 100 亿美元婴儿爽身粉和解协议
item.description: 周一，一名美国破产法官驳回了强生公司提出的 100 亿美元终止指控其婴儿爽身粉和其他滑石粉产品导致卵巢癌的诉讼的建议，这是该公司的破产策略第三次在法庭上失败。【原文：A U.S. bankruptcy judge on Monday rejected Johnson & Johnson's $10 billion proposal to end lawsuits alleging that its baby powder and other talc products cause ovarian cancer, marking the third time the company's bankruptcy strategy has failed in court.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表办公室在特朗普征收对等关税前发布贸易壁垒报告
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提议对全球贸易伙伴征收对等关税的前两天，他的政府于周一发布了一份百科全书式的清单，列出了被其视为贸易壁垒的外国政策和法规。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration released an encyclopedic list of foreign countries' policies and regulations it regards as trade barriers on Monday, two days before he proposed hitting global trading partners with reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 原卢特尼克领导的 Cantor 分析师要求肯尼迪下课
item.description: 曾由特朗普政府商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）领导的坎托-菲茨杰拉德公司（Cantor Fitzgerald）分析师呼吁解除卫生与公众服务部部长小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：Analysts at Cantor Fitzgerald, formerly headed by the Trump administration's Secretary Of Commerce Howard Lutnick, called for the dismissal of Secretary of Health and Human Services Robert F. Kennedy Jr.】

item.title: 私人太空探索公司（SpaceX）机组人员准备发射到环绕地球的新型极地轨道
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司周一将发射由四名私人宇航员组成的乘员组，该乘员组由一名加密货币企业家率领，执行从极点到极点环绕地球飞行的任务。【原文：Elon Musk's SpaceX on Monday was set to launch a crew of four private astronauts led by a crypto entrepreneur on a mission to orbit Earth from pole to pole, a novel trajectory in which no humans have traveled before.】

item.title: 英特尔新任首席执行官告诉客户 "要对我们坦诚相待
item.description: 陈立武在周一作为英特尔新任首席执行官发表的首次讲话中，概述了这家美国标志性芯片制造商的精简版，他将直接与工程师合作，根据公司客户的反馈开发新产品。【原文：In his first remarks as Intel's new CEO, Lip-Bu Tan on Monday outlined a leaner version of the iconic American chipmaker in which he would work directly with engineers to develop new products based on feedback from the company's customers.】

item.title: 密歇根州两个商业团体称，特朗普 25% 的汽车关税将导致汽车价格上涨和汽车工人的痛苦
item.description: 密歇根州的两个商业团体敦促唐纳德-特朗普总统停止对进口汽车和零部件全面征收 25% 关税的计划，称这将导致价格大幅上涨、供应链中断，并给这个汽车重镇带来痛苦。【原文：Two Michigan business groups urged President Donald Trump to halt plans to impose sweeping 25% tariffs on imported vehicles and parts, saying it would lead to dramatic price hikes, supply chain disruptions and pain in the auto-heavy state.】

item.title: OpenAI 将在软银领投的新一轮融资中筹资 400 亿美元
item.description: OpenAI 周一表示，它将在软银集团领投的新一轮融资中筹集 400 亿美元，估值达 3000 亿美元，用于推进人工智能研究、扩大计算基础设施和增强其人工智能工具。【原文：OpenAI said on Monday it would raise $40 billion in a new funding round led by SoftBank Group at a $300 billion valuation to advance AI research, expand computational infrastructure, and enhance its AI tools.】

item.title: 矿商 Freeport-McMoRan 下调第一季度黄金销售预期
item.description: 矿业公司 Freeport-McMoRan 周一下调了第一季度黄金销售预期，原因是印尼的装运时间问题导致其部分季度产量推迟到下一季度。【原文：Miner Freeport-McMoRan lowered its forecast for first-quarter gold sales on Monday, after shipment timing issues in Indonesia led to a deferral of a portion of its quarterly production to future periods.】

item.title: 交易日 华尔街摆脱关税恐惧
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 特朗普签署旨在吸引超过 10 亿美元企业投资的命令
item.description: 白宫表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一签署了一项行政命令，旨在促进和加快超过 10 亿美元的企业投资。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday signed an executive order aimed at facilitating and accelerating corporate investments of more than $1 billion, the White House said.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，日本东京天然气公司将从雪佛龙公司手中购买德克萨斯页岩公司的股份
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周二报道，日本最大的城市燃气供应商东京燃气公司（Tokyo Gas）将从美国能源巨头雪佛龙公司（Chevron）手中购买德克萨斯州页岩气开发项目的股份，这笔交易估计价值数百亿日元。【原文：Japan's biggest city gas provider Tokyo Gas will buy a stake in a shale gas development in Texas from U.S. energy giant Chevron in a deal estimated to be worth tens of billions of yen, the Nikkei reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）数据显示，以美元计价的全球外汇储备比例上升，金额下降
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）周一的数据显示，2024 年最后一个季度，全球作为储备货币持有的美元数量有所下滑，而作为储备货币持有的实际美元比例则有所上升。【原文：The amount in U.S. dollars held as reserve currency globally slipped in the last quarter of 2024 while the percentage of actual dollars held as reserve ticked up, IMF data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司将吸收 General Atlantic 的 Anton Levy 加入董事会
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery）周一表示，计划增聘通用大西洋公司（General Atlantic）的 Anton Levy 为董事会独立董事。【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery said on Monday it plans to add General Atlantic's Anton Levy as an independent director to its board.】

item.title: 安全公司 ReliaQuest 在最新一轮融资中估值 34 亿美元
item.description: 人工智能驱动的安全公司ReliaQuest周一表示，该公司在由EQT、KKR和FTV Capital领投的一轮融资中筹集了5亿多美元，估值达34亿美元。【原文：AI-powered security firm ReliaQuest said on Monday it had raised more than $500 million in a funding round led by EQT, KKR and FTV Capital, valuing it at $3.4 billion.】

item.title: 华尔街本季度跌宕起伏，前景仍不明朗
item.description: 华尔街在这个动荡的季度落下帷幕，在这个季度中，股市在创下历史新高后又陷入调整，投资者面临着大量的政策不确定性，这给未来几个季度的前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：As Wall Street draws the curtain on a tumultuous quarter in which stocks logged a record high before tumbling into correction, investors are faced with a mountain of policy uncertainty that clouds the outlook for coming quarters.】

item.title: 现代汽车警告美国经销商在25%关税下可能涨价
item.description: 现代汽车警告美国经销商在25%关税下可能涨价【原文：Hyundai warns US dealers of possible price hikes amid 25% tariffs】

item.title: 美联储官员在关税相关通胀风险下对利率持谨慎态度
item.description: 纽约联储主席约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周一表示，货币政策已 "做好准备 "应对今年经济可能出现的情况，同时他也承认存在通胀可能再次升温的风险。【原文：New York Federal Reserve President John Williams said on Monday that monetary policy is "well positioned" for what the economy might do this year, as he acknowledged there are risks that inflation could once again heat up.】

item.title: 雅诗兰黛因在华销售行为面临美国法律挑战
item.description: 曼哈顿的一名联邦法官周一裁定，雅诗兰黛必须面对指控该化妆品巨头欺诈股东的诉讼，因为该公司隐瞒了对中国灰色市场不当销售的过度依赖。【原文：Estee Lauder must face a lawsuit accusing the cosmetic giant of defrauding shareholders by concealing its overdependence on improper gray-market sales in China, a federal judge in Manhattan ruled on Monday.】

item.title: 在基德-洛克（Kid Rock）的支持下，特朗普签署了针对倒卖门票的行政命令
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一签署了一项行政命令，旨在保护粉丝免受 "黄牛票剥削"，并改革美国现场娱乐票务行业。【原文：President Donald Trump on Monday signed an executive order aimed at protecting fans from "exploitative ticket scalping" and reforming the U.S. live entertainment ticketing industry.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）的格奥尔基耶娃表示，美国放松数字管制的初步迹象令人鼓舞
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周一在接受路透社 NEXT Newsmaker 采访时表示，特朗普政府计划放松对数字资产的管制，其初步迹象 "相当令人鼓舞"。【原文：Initial signs from the Trump administration on its plans to deregulate digital assets are "quite encouraging," International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva said in a Reuters NEXT Newsmaker interview on Monday.】

item.title: OpenAI 计划在未来几个月内发布开放重量级语言模型
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）周一表示，OpenAI 计划在未来几个月内发布自 GPT-2 以来首个具有推理能力的开放重量级语言模型。【原文：OpenAI is planning to release its first open-weight language model with reasoning capabilities since GPT‑2 in the coming months, CEO Sam Altman said on Monday.】

item.title: 备忘录称瑞银任命全球投资管理新主管
item.description: 据路透社周一看到的一份内部备忘录显示，瑞银已任命其美洲首席投资官 Solita Marcelli 接替 Bruno Marxer 担任全球投资管理主管。【原文：UBS has appointed its Americas chief investment officer, Solita Marcelli, to succeed Bruno Marxer as head of global investment management, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西财政部长称欧盟应将南方共同市场协议视为政治协议而不仅仅是经济协议
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周一表示，欧盟应从政治意义而不仅仅是经济影响的角度来看待与南方共同市场达成的贸易协议。【原文：Brazilian Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Monday the European Union should view its trade deal with Mercosur for its political significance, not just its economic impact.】
